# [Interview #811: JordanCon 2012 - Terez, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=811#13)

#### Question

Was the bubble of evil in the
*A Memory of Light*
prologue a localized effect?

#### Maria Simons

Yes.
